name: Unfair competition, unfair or deceptive acts or practices
text: [§443B-20]  Unfair competition, unfair or deceptive acts or practices.  A violation of this chapter by a collection agency shall constitute unfair methods of competition and unfair or deceptive acts or practices in the conduct of any trade or commerce for the purpose of section 480-2. [L 1987, c 191, pt of §1]
